title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, I noticed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: Currently, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are being repainted entirely when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted when resizing the window in the vertical direction. This will reduce the flashing issue.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Run the control example
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only
3. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
